name: CloudRider
description:
Team: Guo Songyang, Joyce Guo, Zhixi Wang

Control:

AD to move, Q to summon moving cloud, E to hook, S to summon static cloud, F to throw sword, mouse button left to use sword, mouse button right to shoot arrow and space to jump. For hooking, sword throwing, and shooting arrow, hover over location to aim. 

Try jumping on the static cloud (grey)!
